node.title: Building a Better Solution for Our Planet
node.excerpt: Our planet needs real solutions, not just a band aid approach.

node.title: ThreeFold Partner TAG Celebrates Climate Action Day
node.excerpt: Join us as we celebrate the culmination of the Climate Action Project, involving 2.7 million people across 145 countries.

node.title: Today is Earth Day!
node.excerpt: At ThreeFold, we believe in "Planet First." Take a look at some of the ways ThreeFold is acting to positively impact the planet.

node.title: We're Tackling Internet Inequalities

node.title: Tree-Planting is Underway for a Planet-Positive Internet
node.excerpt: Three big Take Action Global and ThreeFold sponsored initiatives across three countries have resulted in 5,000 trees planted so far!

node.title: Actually, you are the product
node.excerpt: Now more than ever with this global pandemic happening since late 2019, our lives are being shaped by our interaction with the digital world

node.title: Not your average blockchain project
node.excerpt: Sometimes we're compared to blockchain projects. We love the blockchain but that's just not who we are.

node.title: Datacenter Myths
node.excerpt: Hyperscale realities are very different to what most people think. Myth 1 - Bigger data centers are more efficient.

node.title: This ThreeFold Farm Keeps Veggies Warm
node.excerpt: Somewhere in the Netherlands, a ThreeFold Farm is supporting the growth of vegetable crops such as tomatoes, peppers and cucumbers.

node.title: Connecting the Dots: ThreeFold plans to scale globally
node.excerpt: ThreeFold started as an idea about ten years ago and is now manifesting itself into the most comprehensive peer-to-peer Internet and cloud infrastructure in the world. The potential of our technology to revolutionize digitization globally is endless and limited only to our collective imagination.

node.title: It's Time We Stand Up For Our Data
node.excerpt: As consumers, we should be able to trust that our data is truly safe and secure. And today, we cannot. It's time we stand up for what is ours.

node.title: Can a 'Democratized' Internet exist in times of a Cyber War?
node.excerpt: With cyber sovereignty turning into a non-territorial challenge to sovereignty itself irrespective of the virtual realm of the internet, is there a way out for humanity?

node.title: An escape from the Great Hack
node.excerpt: I can’t help but think how unfair it is that in today’s digital society, people are being treated like products, because there is no such thing as a ‘free’ platform without YOU being the product.

node.title: A Better Solution for Our Planet
node.excerpt: We believe IT can be sustainable. Actually, it should be! That's why energy efficiency has always been a key focus of ours..

node.title: Building the Future We Want to Live In – A Four Step Journey
node.excerpt: Driven by our planet-first, people-first philosophy, the ThreeFold movement is shaping the world we want to live in and laying the foundation for an open, inclusive and abundance-based future.

node.title: ThreeFold's Long Story Short
node.excerpt: The truth is that ThreeFold is a big project. Here we will try to make things a little simpler for you.

node.title: Response - The Internet is Destroying Our Brains, but We Can't Quit
node.excerpt: A response to a poignant article written by P.E. Moskowitz on the dangers of today's Internet.

node.title: Farming – A Greener Alternative to Crypto Mining
node.excerpt: ThreeFold Farming is about so much more than crypto mining. It's a decentralized, energy-efficient and meaningful alternative.

node.title: The Internet that connects us also manipulates us. In search of a better future.
node.excerpt: The Internet as we know it was once free and decentralized by nature. Over time, the Internet lost its neutrality. ThreeFold represents an opportunity to realize the initial promise of a distributed and neutral Internet owned by the people.

node.title: Welcome to the Internet of Internets
node.excerpt: Together, we’re building our own future through the Internet of Internets – decentralized, open, inclusive, regenerative, and resilient.

node.title: How to stop the Internet from Gobbling the World’s Energy
node.excerpt: Oftentimes, the Internet’s significant energy consumption and climate impacts go unnoticed. At ThreeFold, we're leading the way by working on energy-efficient and sustainable solutions for the Internet.

node.title: A Journey Into ThreeFold
node.excerpt: A conversation with Scott and Sam about Scott's journey into ThreeFold, the tech, the people, and more.

node.title: We Need a More Inclusive Internet
node.excerpt: Today we are working with partners in the clean energy and network / connectivity to build the solutions that are needed to provide fair and uninterrupted internet access with all corners of the world.

node.title: The need for ThreeFold's neutral internet
node.excerpt: The Internet is no longer the neutral place it used to be. +80% of the Internet capacity is delivered by a handful of companies.

node.title: Peer-to-Peer Overcomes Web3 Challenges
node.excerpt: The promise of Web3 is tremendous, but there are clear limitations to overcome. How? Peer-to-peer systems and blockchains, side by side. The best of both worlds.

node.title: Planting the Seeds: ThreeFold's Plans to Regenerate the Planet
node.excerpt: We believe our planet needs regenerative solutions at a large scale. ThreeFold and Take Action Global (TAG) are on a mission to regenerate the planet together.

node.title: Co-Realizing the Promise
node.excerpt: Together with our global community, we're realizing the initial promise of an open-source, peer-to-peer Internet owned by the people.

node.title: The ThreeFold Grid is by the People, For the People
node.excerpt: ThreeFold's open source technology powers the peer-to-peer Internet revolution that holds the premise to disrupt the global Internet in many ways.

node.title: Into the Fold – The ThreeFold Movement
node.excerpt: It's not by mistake that you're here, reading this post. You can feel that a global shift is happening. And you want to do something about it.

node.title: How ThreeFold Will Give Internet to 43% of the World’s Population
node.excerpt: Proper access to the Internet helps to protect people’s freedom of speech and thought, as well as access to knowledge and information.

node.title: ThreeFold at Consensus: A Decentralized World is in Our Hands
node.excerpt: It’s that time of the year when believers and builders of a decentralized tomorrow gather to celebrate the festival for the decentralized world. And ThreeFold is the foundation to realize a truly decentralized world.

node.title: How ThreeFold offers Data Sovereignty
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is building the engine for an Internet where people can finally be data sovereign.

node.title: ThreeFold’s Planet Positive Plan
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is taking not just a sustainable approach, we’re setting the plan for a planet positive Internet.

node.title: What Is Peer-to-Peer and Why Is It so Important?
node.excerpt: P2P systems are network, not linear or pyramidal hierarchies (though they may share some elements)..

node.title: Why should I care?
